attributes.description: We are pleased to introduce ourselves as one of the regular exporters of all kinds of leading branded pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, soaps & toiletries. All our products are available in English text. We are exporting many products of leading MNC. To name a few for your reference are UniLever Ltd; P&G, Henkel, Reckitt Benckiser; Cadbury, Perfetti Van Melle, Johnson Diversey; Eveready Industries; Glaxo; Duracell; Garnier, Gillette India; Godrej etc.
attributes.title: Indo Gulf Co

attributes.description:
*Exporter, Distributor, Wholesaler, Importer,

We are interested into co-operation and we would like to buy from your company the following products: Colgate toothpaste (all kinds),pepsodent and Oral - B toothbrush, Ariel detergent, Gillette Mach 3 Soaps (Lux, Dove, Camay, Fa), Shampoos, Razor Blades, Gillette Mach 3''s  & turbo & cosmetic, Systems Shaving (Venus), Shave Preparation, Gillette Original (Gel), Gillette Series Toiletries, L''Oreal,DOVE, Dyson, GSK, Braun, Duracell etc. and others. Please, let us have your product list, the prices offered and photo pictures. Coca cola.

If the prices are attractive, we can start to co-operate.
My regards:

Mariusz Stokowy
pentorcoltd@poczta.onet.pl
attributes.title: Pentor Company LTD

attributes.description:
South African based Export Company, dealing in Branded Toiletries, Toothpaste and Soaps. Products are of South African Orign, in English Text.
Colgate Toothpaste Range 100ml. and Lux Soap 125gm.

Kindly forward us your enquiry for detailed information and prices.
attributes.title: Pan Afro Marketing

attributes.description:
Target Markets: North America, South America, Eastern Europe, Southeast Asia, Africa, Oceania, Mid East, Eastern Asia, Western Europe

Business Type: Manufacturer, Exporter

Guangzhou Yishimei Daily Chemical Co., Ltd. was established in 1999, mainly engaged in producing commodities, such as toothpastes, soaps and shampoos. With more than ten years' experience, we have been one of the main commodity manufacturers in Guangzhou. Specializing in the commodities, we have strong technical force, advanced equipment and technology and a quality control system. Our sophisticated equipment ensures that all of our products are manufactured in line with international quality standards. 

With a sales network covering both China and overseas markets, we have set up an excellent reputation in construction industry. Until now, our products have been exported to the Philippines, Europe and the Middle East, with annual sales turnovers in excess of USD 1,000,000.
attributes.title: Guangzhou Yishimei Daily Chemical Co., Ltd.
